" Mike Pence displays the kind of optimism, moral values and gutsy leadership we need in a president-- and a presidential nominee," says the draft-Pence website, theconservativechampion.org. He bridges the gap between the establishment and the grassroots, wrote influential conservative blogger Erick Erickson on RedState.com.
